name: fluexgl-audio
description: An audio library which works with FluexGL

scripts.wasm:dev: sh -c 'cd lib/wasm && wasm-pack build --dev --target web --out-dir ../_dist/wasm --out-name fluex_dsp'
scripts.watch:wasm: sh -c 'cd lib/wasm && cargo watch -w src -s "wasm-pack build --dev --target web --out-dir ../_dist/wasm --out-name fluex_dsp"'
scripts.ps-watch:wasm: powershell -Command "cd lib/wasm; cargo watch -w src -s 'wasm-pack build --dev --target no-modules --out-dir ../_dist/wasm --out-name fluex_dsp'"
scripts.wasm:rel: sh -c 'cd lib/wasm && wasm-pack build --release --target web --out-dir ../_dist/wasm --out-name fluex_dsp'
scripts.build: npm run wasm:rel && npm run wasm:opt

author: Rohan Kanhaisingh
